revised_title: Investigating the Electrolysis of Secondary Compounds and Their Decomposition
tldr: The author investigates the electrolysis of secondary compounds, specifically focusing on the decomposition of sulfate of soda and the relationship between the decomposition of water and the decomposition of the compound electrolyte. The results show that the decomposition of an equivalent of water is accompanied by the decomposition of an exact equivalent of the sulfate of soda.
